name: Desyn.In-A Web & SEO Service Provider Company
overview:
Desyn.In is a professional and leading Web Service Provider Company in Chandigarh, India established in Early 2011 by Nishant Kalia- Director IT Operations with more than 10 years of experience in Digital Designing and Geetanjali Gupta- Director Business Operations; has been AIESEC Alumni holding Vice-President Position in AIESEC North India.

We offer professional web services, affordable SEO services and reliable web solutions to worldwide clients from small sized business units to big corporate houses. Branding and marketing is the key to the success of businesses online. Our web and SEO services are the cutting-edge, goal-driven and result-oriented branding and marketing solutions for businesses of all sizes.

Our main client base is from USA and Canada and 20% is from Australia.

Our idea behind its conception is to give a refined look to World Wide Web and the core motive was to lay a difference in web experience and serve our clients with hospitality and professionalism.

Being a leading company, we take every project like our personal responsibility where we put our greatest efforts for the success of clients business as our success very much depends upon client’s satisfaction and profits. Our motto is to erect long term relationships with the clients. We don’t limit our services to just project completions, we believe in assisting our client’s throughout the life cycle of website.

Our Achievements/Milestones

On 16 October 2012, we have successfully accomplished our 500 projects. We are also featured in various design galleries and magazines like vandaley, cssmania, neucss, dribbble, forrst, and various Spanish magazines.

We invite you to view our portfolio on our website www.desyn.in. While we cannot post all our client works on our website, we are providing you some links of the projects we are really proud of doing.

Dribbble: http://dribbble.com/desyn Forrst: http://forrst.com/people/desyn/posts

Future Prospects

Our future prospect is to grow maintaining our objectives and quality and take one more step ahead to improve our work quality and services.

Get in Touch With Us
